Commands.Chain Slash: 5-HIT BRV attack.  Provokes the target and grants Action Delay Down.  Deals more damage when an enemy is targeting the user.
Commands.Rush Assault: 8-HIT BRV+HP attack.  Grants Max BRV Up.  Deals more damage when an enemy is targeting the user.
Commands.Base Advance: Slightly raises Initial BRV for 2 turns  BRV stolen can overflow by a small amount for 2 turns  No action delay  Doesn't increase turn count  Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count
Commands.Apocalypse: 6-HIT AoE BRV+HP attack.  HP damage is divided equally amongst all enemies.  Raises the total potency when an enemy is targeting the user.  BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV.  Provokes all enemies for 4 turns (Lock debuff).  Grants BRV Barrier for 4 turns.  BRV Barrier has the following effects:  - Nullifies BRV damage under 150% Initial BRV.  - If the incoming BRV damage is above that %, lowers BRV damage by that value.  - Dispelled if broken.

Passives.Chain Slash Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Chain Slash.
Passives.Debuff Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed while an enemy is debuffed.
Passives.High Tension: Slightly raises Attack for 3 turns when the battle starts.
Passives.Rush Assault Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Rush Assault.
Passives.BRV Danger Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed when BRV is below Initial BRV.
Passives.Chain Slash Charge: Increases the max uses of Chain Slash by 1.
Passives.Debuff Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack while an enemy is debuffed.
Passives.Rush Assault Charge: Increases the max uses of Rush Assault by 1.
Passives.SOLDIER's Pride: Slightly raises Max BRV and Attack if HP is Max when the final battle starts.
Passives.Buff Boost&Speed Up: Slightly raises Max BRV and Speed while buffed.
Passives.Chain Slash Extend: When using Chain Slash:- Moderately raises its potency.- BRV stolen can overflow up to 120% Max BRV.- Triggers an HP attack after use.- Converts 10% HP damage dealt to BRV.After using Chain Slash:- Turns BRV Attack to BRV Attack+ for 6 turns.- BRV Attack+ has the following effects: + 2-HIT melee BRV attack. + Moderate potency boost. + Provokes the target for 2 turns (Lock debuff).
Passives.Buff Attack&Boost All: Moderately raises party's Max BRV and Attack while buffed.
Passives.Rush Assault Extend: When using Rush Assault:- Deals a 8-HIT set of melee BRV+HP attacks.- First set is 3-HIT melee BRV+HP attack.- Second is a 2-HIT melee BRV+HP attack.- Third is a 3-HIT melee BRV+HP attack.- Greatly raises its total potency.- Converts 10% HP damage dealt to BRV.- Extends the duration of granted buffs by 2 turns.After using Rush Assault:- Turns HP Attack to HP Attack+ for 7 turns.- HP Attack+ has the following effects: + Raises BRV based on Max BRV before the HP attack. + Converts 10% HP damage dealt to BRV.
Passives.Radiance of Destruction and Power: Raises Max BRV and Attack by 20%
Passives.Base Advance Extend: When using  Base Advance :- Slightly improves Initial BRV Up effect- Slightly raises the Max BRV Overflow limit

Weapons.Hardedge CP: 15: Increases the potency of Chain Slash.Raises further the potency increase when an enemy is targeting Zack.Extends the duration of Provoke.Extends the duration of Action Delay Down and increases its potency.Grants Physical Resistance Up for 4 turns.
Weapons.Enhance Sword CP: 70: May equip the EX Ability Apocalypse.
Weapons.Buster Sword Z Ver. CP: 35: Increases the potency of Rush Assault and lowers its Action Delay.Raises further the potency increase when an enemy is targeting Zack.Extends the duration of Max BRV Up and increases its potency.Grants HP Regen for 5 turns.
Weapons.Bloom Stone CP: Cannot be equipped: Base Advance  use +1Duration of  Base Advance  effects +2 turns
